Sentencas: Chemical looping hydrogen generation (CLHG) is integrated with solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and combined cycle for high-efficiency power production with CO2 sequestration.
Titulo: Process integration of coal fueled chemical looping hydrogen generation with SOFC for power production and CO2 capture

Sentencas: To avoid energy penalty imposed by cryogenic air separation unit for oxygen production, the CLHG is directly fed by coal.
Titulo: Process integration of coal fueled chemical looping hydrogen generation with SOFC for power production and CO2 capture

Sentencas: The coal gasification and iron oxide reaction occur in the same reactor and no gaseous oxygen is used in gasification.
Titulo: Process integration of coal fueled chemical looping hydrogen generation with SOFC for power production and CO2 capture

Sentencas: The CLHG operates at an auto thermal condition by solid circulation.
Titulo: Process integration of coal fueled chemical looping hydrogen generation with SOFC for power production and CO2 capture

Sentencas: The proposed system could achieve a net power efficiency of 41.59% at a baseline case.
Titulo: Process integration of coal fueled chemical looping hydrogen generation with SOFC for power production and CO2 capture

Sentencas: Sensitivity analysis is conducted as well on the basis of heat balance.
Titulo: Process integration of coal fueled chemical looping hydrogen generation with SOFC for power production and CO2 capture

Sentencas: Varying the temperatures of CLHG reactors and iron oxide circulation rate influences the system's efficiency.
Titulo: Process integration of coal fueled chemical looping hydrogen generation with SOFC for power production and CO2 capture

Sentencas: The increase of the fuel cell's temperature and fuel utilization factor favors the system's net power efficiency.
Titulo: Process integration of coal fueled chemical looping hydrogen generation with SOFC for power production and CO2 capture

Sentencas: In addition to high net power efficiency, the CO2 capture rate of the proposed system is up to similar to 100%, resulting in a virtual carbon-free power plant.
Titulo: Process integration of coal fueled chemical looping hydrogen generation with SOFC for power production and CO2 capture
